Name: Sugar Man
Ingredients: 45 ml Bacardi Carta Blanca Superior White Rum
Instructions: SHAKE first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with ginger beer.
History: Singaporean Bacardí Legacy 2015 winning cocktail created by Peter Chua Zhibin at 28 Hong Kong Street, Singapore.
Nutrition: One serving of Sugar Man contains 164 calories
